fullplot: A modern day Cinderella story which sees disaster prone Rebecca embark on a journey in search of true love. Betrayed by her boyfriend, Richard and following a palm reader's psychic prophecy, Rebecca goes in search of her one true soul mate.
plot: A jilted photographer sets off on a mission to get back at her philandering model boyfriend and along the way discovers that not all love is created equal.
title: Dirty Love

tomatoes.consensus: The laugh-free Dirty Love is a comedy dead zone -- it's aggressively crude and shoddily constructed.
